metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23807 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin 4.9 before 4.9.8 and 5.1 before5.1.2. A valid user who is already authenticated to phpMyAdmin canmanipulate their account to bypass two-factor authentication for futurelogin instances.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
